bio:
The Sartorialist
Founded in 2005
2012 CFDA Media Award
Author of three books

list.comment: Via Montenapoleone and it’s surrounding streets must be the single most chic streets (by-density-of-chic-per-capita) than any other collection of streets anywhere in the world!

I really thought this young lady was one of the most stylish I saw during my last visit to Paris. Simple, chic outfit and great hair! In this period of overdone everything it’s so refreshing to see a little understatement occasionally, Paris @libbyataylor

Knightsbridge, London
October, 2018
@marni has always had a way of attracting the most chic ladies to their show and this season was no exception, Milan
Before @fendi, Milan (Check Stories for a longer crop)
This is another very elegant Milanese lady you won’t typically find at a fashion show or an influencer lunch but you will find her curating the goods at her chic boutique in Milan @imarika_milano !
Always one of my favorites @driesvannoten flowers and feathers, Paris
Today’s office high in the Himalayan Mountains
Milan was still pretty warm when I was there last time but I’m kinda ok with that, Milan
It’s so refreshing to travel with a curious person like @jennymwalton ! I’ve been to a place like Milan so many times that it’s great to see it through her eyes, “It's like déjà vu all over again” YB

New York City tomorrow night!!! “Dressing up in a dress-down world!” A debate on the state of menswear today! I will join my good friends @andersonandsheppard, @buddshirtmakers , @permanentstylelondon , Bruce G. Boyer, @jayfielden and several others in a lively discussion on what we wear and why! Tuesday 16th of October at 6:30pm @ The General Society Library 20 W 44th St RSVP at RSVP@permanentstyle.com
Like a Cubist painting in the center of Milan!
Basking in the warm morning glow of @altuzarra ‘s Italian summer dream

I’m usually “On the Street” but this time I’m “In the Shop”! I thought this young lady’s mix of stripes (vertical stripe pants and horizontal stripe shirt) was simple but sweet, London (I know it’s a little hard to see the stripe on the top so I’ll post this in Stories too)
I’m sure they’re talking about food and this is the part of the recipe that you add a pinch of salt
A belated but hearty Happy Birthday to my good friend Alessandro @alessandrosquarzi He really is style personified!
Looks like @jennymwalton will be borrowing some of my suit jackets next spring...sounds like a shopping opportunity for me!!! 😁 @miumiu
🌈 and 👟 taking over the streets of Pairs!
The incomparable @rossana_orlandi! a great character of Milan design community!
Parisian chic at is most sublime, Paris
Fantastic @maisonvalentino a standing ovation!!!!

LBD but as a navy knit one-piece (I think it’s a one-piece bc of how it moves across her legs but maybe it’s a dress) Either way it takes a strong personality to wear it and she seems to have it! Milano
Thanks @linoieluzziofficial of Al Bazar Milano for still including an extra set of cuffs and a collar when you purchase a @guy_rover shirt! That’s what I call modern sustainability
Slouchy chic with just a touch of Parisian sweet, Paris
It’s finally and consistently sweater weather!! Milan
Sweater weather doesn’t always mean being over-bundled, Paris
What a great way to make the pocket square the star of the look! It ties together the elements of the shirt, tie, and suit! Bravo @sartoriaripense
Such a funny mix of stripes and pattern! Milan
@giuliatordini is always ready to laugh and ,if need be, break a move, Paris

I saw this young lady in Milan and there was just something so unselfconscious and elegant about how she wore her clothes, her hair and even the way she held her cigarette (even though I know cigarettes are very very bad) I took this photo and then asked to shoot her right after but once she was aware she was being photographed it wasn’t the same nonchalance. She’s maybe one of those special breed that has to be “captured” in the moment. (I also put a better crop in Stories to get a better sense of her grace)
The perfect Thanksgiving Day jacket ! Thanks @driesvannoten
This handsome guy again @giovannidariolaudicina 💁🏼‍♂️, Milan
This is a man that knows how to wear a jacket with the ease of a cardigan! The ever chic Mr. Pierre Maheo of @officinegenerale

Thanks Jeremy of @blamopodcast for the fun discussion about my days before photography, fatherhood and fashion! I should have posted about this earlier but it’s never easy for me to post about me! Hahah 💁🏼‍♂️
51 and fun today!
It feels so 80s but looks so right now, Milan

Just starting to post images from a great month of fashion weeks in New York, London, Milan and Paris!! Plus I’ll be back in India this Friday so the mix of content over the next few weeks should be great!
It’s tough to be a street photographer when there are no streets! Thanks @maserati for helping me get around the backroads and vineyards of Burgundy #advertising #maserati
